name: Homecoming (honeyed laughter)
description:
The night is winding down, and everything is wrapping up. You still got one last dance left in you, though. A short Twine game where you enjoy homecoming and get to dance with your bestie.

  • Have your first slow dance.
  • See the beginnings of a new relationship.
  • Around 700 words.

My first Twine game. Thanks for checking it out!
